mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (user_id, type, target_id, parent_id, reply_user_id, content, like_count, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{parentId}, #{replyUserId}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.nickname as user_name, u.avatar as user_avatar, ru.nickname as reply_user_name FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.*, u.nickname as user_name, u.avatar as user_avatar, ru.nickname as reply_user_name FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id WHERE c.type = #{type} AND c.target_id = #{targetId} AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
